Package com.dp16.dynamicrunninginghent.StatTracker

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AggregateRunningStatistics
    This class stores the aggregated statistics of a user.
    AggregateRunningStatisticsHandler
    Class that handles the AggregateRunningStatistics.
    RouteEngine
    The purpose of this class is to provide navigation directions at the appropriate time.
    RunningStatistics
    Object that holds all statistics from a run.
    StatTracker
    This class collects statistics while running and stores them in a RunningStatistics object.
